Event.name: Giving_scenario
Event.definition: <def-root>The sequence of events in which the <fen>Donor</fen> begins in possession of the <fen>Theme</fen>, then gives it to the <fen>Recipient</fen>, relinquishing possession. </def-root>

Arg.name: Donor
Arg.definition: <def-root>The person that begins in possession of the <fen>Theme</fen> and causes it to be in the possession of the <fen>Recipient</fen> .</def-root>

Arg.name: Recipient
Arg.definition: <def-root>The individual that ends up in possession of the <fen>Theme</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Purpose</fen> for which the <fen>Donor</fen> gives the <fen>Theme</fen> to the <fen>Recipient</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Manner</fen> is the manner in which the <fen>Donor</fen> gives the <fen>Theme</fen> to the <fen>Recipient</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Imposed_purpose
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Recipient</fen>'s intended purpose for the <fen>Theme</fen>.
<ex>Please <t>give</t> this list to the secretary <fex name="Imposed_purpose">for entry into the client database</fex>.</ex></def-root>
